title: Sidewall, 1976-48-70-a,b, 1820–50
description: Floral stripe, with vertical band of flowers between bands of stylized floral motifs.  On either side of the stripe is a small diamond trellis pattern, with a four-point star covering the line intersections, and a dot in the center of each diamond.  Printed in red, green and white on a blue ground.
